# Shuttle

A local Core node.

### Instructions
To run a shuttle localy simply run:

```bash
shuttle
```

This will launch a local node and will listen for rpc calls at: `127.0.0.1:8545`


There are also 10 prefunded accounts with 1000 core:
